name: RadioSherlockHolmes
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio sherlock holmes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Radio Sherlock Holmes plays 798 The New Adventures of Sherlock Holmes episodes from this popular long-running detective series like in the golden age of radio for entertainment, to help you relax, sleep, relieve stress, or block out noise.

HOW TO USE:

In the spirit of old-time radio, every episode in Radio Sherlock Holmes is broadcasted live in its entirety and cannot be paused, skipped, or resumed and plays dead air for nonexistent episodes just like a real old-time radio station in the golden age of radio.

To Get Started: Say "Alexa, open Radio Sherlock Holmes". When prompted, please say the episode you want to play, for example, you could say "1" or "2" up to "798".

Finally, to stop playing say "Alexa, stop".

If for some reason the episode does not play please confirm that the episode is between 1 to 798 and if it is, please just say “Alexa, stop” and start over.

To access Radio Sherlock Holmes and our growing catalog of over 100,000+ episodes from over 1,000+ popular old-time radio programs please visit our Radio Program Guide using the Media > Guide icon at Appbly.com.

PRO TIPS:

Pro Navigation Tip: To quickly navigate episodes in the playlist when an episode is playing say, "Alexa, repeat". When prompted, please say the episode you want to play, for example, you could say "1" or "2" up to "798".

Pro Starter Tip: Say "Alexa, open Radio Sherlock Holmes". When prompted, please say the episode you want to play. For example, to play Episode 1, you could say "1", "Episode 1", "Sherlock Holmes 1", "Sherlock Holmes Episode 1", "Radio Sherlock Holmes 1", or "Radio Sherlock Holmes Episode 1".

REVIEWS, FEEDBACK, AND SUPPORT:

We hope you'll love Radio Sherlock Holmes and leave us a review. Your reviews encourage us to keep making more great Skills! If you feel that Radio Sherlock Holmes can be improved, please send us an email using the Contact icon at Appbly.com and we'll do everything in our power to make it better.

We'd love to hear from you! Your reviews and feedback are important to us! If you have questions, comments, suggestions, or feedback, please send us an email using the Contact icon at Appbly.com.
priv:
